body_html: I would prefer not to add another API to this class too. Users should be able to easily understand that maximizing a value is the same as minimizing the negative value (or even the reciprocal of the value). Keeping our core classes simple is going to be a better benefit to everyone in the long term. You are free to develop a higher-level library with this functionality and API though!

body: I would prefer not to add another API to this class too.  Users should be able to easily understand that maximizing a value is the same as minimizing the negative value (or even the reciprocal of the value).  Keeping our core classes simple is going to be a better benefit to everyone in the long term.  You are free to develop a higher-level library with this functionality and API though!
